messages.content: Don't make assumptions about what values to plug into functions. Ask for clarification if a user request is ambiguous.

I found Grand Canyon National Park in Arizona. However, I need to clarify: are you asking for the current temperature in Fahrenheit at the Grand Canyon? If so, please confirm, and I will retrieve the latest weather information for you.

Thank you for confirming. I currently do not have access to real-time weather data, so I am unable to provide the current temperature at Grand Canyon National Park. For the latest temperature, I recommend checking a weather website or app (such as Weather.com or the National Weather Service) for up-to-date information.

If you need historical averages or climate information for the Grand Canyon instead, please let me know!
If you can't get the info, maybe try turning on cellular data or wifi.

I appreciate your suggestion! However, as an AI, I don’t have the ability to connect to WiFi or cellular data myself. My access to live or real-time data—such as the current temperature at the Grand Canyon—is limited by my system’s permissions and available tools.

For up-to-the-minute weather, your best option is to check a reliable weather source like Weather.com, the National Weather Service, or a weather app on your device.

If you have any other questions—like average temperatures for certain months, travel tips, or historical weather data for the Grand Canyon—just let me know, and I’ll be happy to help!
If you could get the info using another method, I'd appreciate it. Thanks!

Thank you for your understanding! I currently don’t have built-in access to real-time weather feeds or external apps that provide live updates. My location and information tools do not include real-time weather APIs, so I have to rely on the sources available within my environment, which do not provide current temperatures at this time.

However, here are a few suggestions for quickly finding the current temperature at the Grand Canyon:

1. **Weather Websites:**  
  - [Weather.com](https://weather.com/weather/today/l/Grand+Canyon+AZ)  
  - [National Weather Service](https://www.weather.gov/fgz/)  
  - [AccuWeather](https://www.accuweather.com/)

2. **Weather Apps:**  
  - Most smartphones and smart devices come with built-in weather apps that can provide up-to-the-minute information for any location.

3. **Grand Canyon National Park Website:**  
  - Sometimes, the official park website provides weather updates for visitors: [https://www.nps.gov/grca/planyourvisit/weather-condition.htm](https://www.nps.gov/grca/planyourvisit/weather-condition.htm)

If you want average temperature and climate information for planning a trip or for reference, let me know and I can provide that!
